text: Ne owa Nyasaye alunjisia kho oyo niye omulunjifu, ne ulia owa alekha okhukora mana ewe sholabanyoolela omulindi ulali ye tawe (Nyasaye) Ne khulibakhungâ€™asia inyanga yeyindukho ni bakhweswe khubweni bwabu, ne nibali abawofu nende abasilu nende abekala amarwi. eshimenyo shiabu ni Jahanam, nikukhola okhututuya okhwakha khwako, khukumetelanga omwakho
